entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debug assertion failure in System.Net.Http.HttpConnection.SendAsync #100616
    9.0.0
  • Suggestion: Make X509Certificate2Collection (and X509CertificateCollection) thread-safe #100613
  • PDBs for Crossgen2 Native Assets missing in the symbol package #100611
  • Valgrind: JIT noway_assert codeGen->genAddrRelocTypeHint((size_t)addr) != IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 #100600
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Runtime Aborts after executing Program::Main() #100597
  • GC sometimes reports survival rates above 100% #100594
    9.0.0
  • Consider adding a new reflection API to get field values of an Enum #100592
  • [wasm] Don't require ICU libs for invariant globalization #100583
    Future
  • Dotnet native compiled js file referencing wrong function in blazor web assembly file #100591
  • TestNonCollectibleType times out under GCStress #100576
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions BuildServiceProvider System.MissingMethodException failure #100571
  • Test failure: GC/Features/SustainedLowLatency/scenario/scenario.sh #100567

Closed

  • Test suite crash in new exception handling #100563
  • Update clang-format/clang-tidy tools #59545
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer DeserializeAsyncEnumerable works slowly with large json files (10+mb) #100582
    9.0.0
  • PEReader throws exception when using PEStreamOptions.PrefetchMetadata for some assemblies #46344
    9.0.0
  • Dotnet Package for centos not installing from https://packages.microsoft.com/centos/8/prod/Packages/d/ #99672
  • Support System.DirectoryServices on Linux #93326
    Future
  • Uninitialized memory usage in MethodTableBuilder #100559
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #100477
    9.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Revisit the size of pthread pool for CI #75602
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] HybridGlobalization: V8 crash on `System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema.Tests` #95981
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.QuicException : The connection timed out from inactivity. #100219
  • [8.0] Build failure in linux.riscv64.Checked - No usable version of clang found #100564

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Update CI builds to not use VS Previews #100622
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.x
  • Add extra logging to the unhandled exception test #100620
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.SizeOf #100618
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add build option to build Mac .dSYM debug symbol bundles #100617
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove CLANG_FORMAT_COMMENT_ANCHOR #100615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split the HttpConnectionPool into multiple files #100614
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Pass SourceBuiltSymbolsDir property to inner build #100612
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][MT] improve abort on web worker #100610
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix the LargestVectorSize parameter for SVE test cases #100606
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add RequiresProcessIsolation in testcase Runtime_100437 #100605
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix compact time computation #100599
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Clean up macro in GetLogicalProcessorCacheSizeFromOS to include cacheSize as a parameter via a new argument CURRENT_CACHE_SIZE #100596
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #100595
    needs-area-label
  • Enable tail call generation for coreclr test Runtime_87393 #100593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make ToDictionary() selectors parallel. #100590
    area-System.Linq.Parallel, community-contribution
  • Use multi-reg load/store for DecodeFromUTF8 #100589
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Make host tests use single copy of shared framework #100588
    area-Host
  • Avoid loading ICU data early during mono startup #100587
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Perform manual intermediate certificate lookup when creating MsQuicConfiguration #100584
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove distros versions calculation #100580
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix assertion for auipc and lui #100578
    community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Guard against -1 Returned from sysconf for the Cache Sizes Causing Large Gen0 Sizes and Budgets for Certain Linux Distributions. #100575
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr
  • Exclude unhandledTester test on native AOT #100574
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Rewrite register parameter homing #100572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete dead code in GetLogicalProcessorCacheSizeFromOS for Linux Arm64 #100570
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Task.WaitAll overload for `IEnumerable<Task>` #100569
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, needs-area-label
  • [LoongArch64] amend the disasmbly formate of lu52id and branches. #100568
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Use Arcade log publishing instead of our own publishing #100566
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove HOST_CALLS contract and related stuff #100604
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update CI builds to not use VS Previews #100598
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix building x86 Windows native AOT runtime packs #100512
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update JIT sources to clang-format/clang-tidy 17.0.6 #100498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix some display math issues in reconstruction doc #100609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable JitOptRepeat as a perf experiment #100607
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • PEReader throws exception when using PEStreamOptions.PrefetchMetadata for some assemblies #100472
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [ppc64le] Fixed insufficient memory exception issue #100337
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: add note on profile reconstruction #100601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • DATAS tuning changes for small HCs #100390
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete dead code #100551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Guard against -1 Returned from sysconf for the Cache Sizes Causing Large Gen0 Sizes and Budgets for Certain Linux Distributions. #100502
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Fix origin for warnings due to event methods #100500
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix use of uninitialized `bool` value #100560
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Several improvements / simplifications in Regex #100315
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: fix early convergence in profile count solver #100552
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] assert no managed transition on UI thread after start #100410
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][ws] Do not duplicate code executed in `local_on_close` #99685
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][bench] Fix startup measurements #100579
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][mt] Block Blazor WBT that timeout #100577
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] smaller thread pool #100415
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Disable more_tailcalls under GCStress #100540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema.Tests for HybridGlobalization on v8 #100522
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • JIT: Add ABI classifier for arm32 #100526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Fix sve unit tests #100549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Cleanup of `fx_resolver_t` and tests in `NativeHostApis` #100542
    area-Host

Updated

  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.Box #100561
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100426
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improvements to startup performance of mono_wasm_get_assembly_exports #99924
    arch-wasm, linkable-framework, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Support Swift error handling for reverse P/Invokes #100429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for frozen structs in Swift reverse pinvokes #100344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add log to SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException. #100525
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable runtime tests in fullAOT LLVM mode on linux-x64 #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][interp] Reduce false pinning from interp stack #100400
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Http2 deadlock #100086
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 8.0.x
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Migrate various GHashTables to dn_simdhash #100497
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-watch.Tests.dll.1 is timing out sometimes #39993
  • Provide better documentation for using custom test logger in `dotnet test` and make the tool produce more diagnostics. #39990
  • inconsistent "roll forward" terminology or behavior/applicability #39989

Closed

  • CA2022 error in RazorSdk tool source #39893

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40002
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #40001
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #40000
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39997
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor workload sets #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Temporarily disabling Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works test #39979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable CA2022 errors #39992
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the compiling version to the latest MSBuild from that band to fix scanner issues #39896
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Temporarily disabling Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works test #39975
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use built-in SourceRevisionId instead of git rev-parse HEAD #39613
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39971
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #39958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't use the xunit return code when running in helix only #39271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabling codeflow of nuget.localization #39590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39591
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39589
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to depencency flow #39595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Rewrite Newtonsoft version in testhost.deps.json #39865
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Add workload config command #39888
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2421785 #39828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update warning message for containers package detection when building SDK-containerizable project types #39956
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Use Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat images by default starting in 8.0.300 #39614
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Containers 8.0.3xx Package Release Notes #39942
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Return tokens to emitted symbols on EmitResult #72869
  • Investigate changes to LSP pull-diagnostics to make it more efficient. #72868
  • Roslyn needs to move to System.Text.Json for LSP messages. #72867
  • Semantic Search: Use ActivationConstraint.FeatureFlag Gladstone API instead of a custom UI context #72866
  • Files and process remain open when building projects with docker container #72864
  • C# Roslyn "process terminated" NRE critical failure, with repro #72862
  • SyntaxToken.GetNextToken is very slow for long Child/Token lists - which causes SyntaxNormalizer to be slow as well #72861
  • Why "InvocationExpressionSyntaxAnalyzer.Analyze" Is being called thousands of times in this syntax analyzer ? #72857

Closed

  • Translation of lines is causing incorrect formatting #71411
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Document deviation from member lookup standard #72858
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged

Merged

  • Use GetRequiredProject helper. #72859
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add wait option to Replay #72852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72856
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11
  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Semantic snippets: Implement `do` snippet #72842
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Warn for `yield return` in `lock` #72755
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [WIP] Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: connectionclose #54934
  • Perf improvement: updates #54933
  • QuickGrid - RowDetail #54930
  • Using Multiple authentication scheme I am experiencing recursion #54929
  • Fixing Attribute Filtering Logic in DefaultApplicationModelProvider" #54920
  • Show Connection Status users in blaozr .net 8 with signalR #54919

Closed

  • Why Do I need call JS Code in Blazor apps? #54850
  • Questions about Blazor component disposal #54876
  • [Blazor] Parameter on root page causes loss of layout/CSS #54880
  • Quarantine CanUpdateComplexParameters and CanUpdateSimpleParameters #54889
    9.0-preview5
  • .Net 8 Blazor Web App Identity Framework Help #53732
  • BlazorWebAssemblyStandaloneWithIdentity and Offline support #53484
  • EventReciever from OL element prevents the Bullet list after inserting hyperlink within the Text Editor in SharePoint Online Webpart #54923
  • [WebView2] WebViewManager does not search for the correct staticwebassets.runtime.json file when using a BlazorWebView from another csproj #54417
  • Webapp default template exception #54926
  • Newly created page immediately switches to "Not found" page #54795
  • Perf regression: plaintext #54909

PullRequests

Created

  • Add APIs for OpenAPI document transformers #54935
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • fix: added missing webtransport check before establishing a session #54927
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Enable fixed tests. #54917
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Fix custom elements JS initializer not being included in build output #54931
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Support generating OpenAPI operation and associated fields #54903
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix developer exception page showing duplicate endpoint metadata #54893
    area-middleware, 9.0-preview4
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54866
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.19
  • [release/8.0] Backport test fixes #54912
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Suppress .ps1 SDL errors #54914
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.30
  • [release/8.0] Suppress .ps1 SDL errors #54915
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.5

Updated

  • Force full reload on popstate #54877
    area-blazor
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 3) #54878
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [windows] Account for ObjectDisposedException coming from device tests for MauiWebView #21631
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [iOS] CollectionView gets moved when keyboard or picker show up #21630
  • Entry Text Color and Entry Background Color not conforming to Color Setting #21629
  • Packaged Windows App Missing Permissions after installed? #21626
  • Labels with HTML ignore text alignment like Padding, Margin provided in HTML #21624
    Backlog
  • The SVG picture of the navigation menu ICON does not display correctly on Windows #21622
    Backlog
  • TappedGestureRecognizer ignores Frame's IsEnabled #21619
    Backlog
  • Can't build Maccatalyst, getting error about merging CSS files? #21618
  • Reenable Windows UI Tests AND make Android UI tests work #21617
    .NET 8 SR4
  • After rotating the emulator from horizontal to vertical orientation, the card of page My Recipes is truncated. #21609
    Backlog

Closed

  • Upgrade to 8.0.203 from 8.0.101 for MAUI App #21566
  • Button on .NET8 not considering CornerRadius="0" #19421
    .NET 8 SR2

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't worry about the size of the text #21628
  • [Trimming] Use new feature switch definition attribute #21621
  • [X] generate less IL for x:Array #21615
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Avoid crash adding items to ObservableCollection #21613
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃

Merged

  • [C] remove listener on changing MainPage #21616
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add remark Screenshot Quality only applies to JPG #21610
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, t/docs 📝
  • [net9.0] Revert "[net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back (#20727)" #21560

Updated

  • Making sure FindMauiContext fallbacks to default for the title icon i… #21519
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] Fix issue that does not allow scrolling in WebView with PDF #21571
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-editor
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • BindableObject System.NullReferenceException when bindings queue gets messed up #21523
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Remove update cell size call from bind #21606
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [android] improve FormattedString performance #21530
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, control-titleview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No suitable constructor was found for entity type 'CollectionEntry' #33469
  • xml column like (SQL server) #33468
  • Is it possible to ignore an entire folder of partial class files? #33467
  • Internal NullReferenceException when using Owned Entities with TPH Inheritance #33465

Closed

  • [Cosmos] Support collections of scalar types #4179
    9.0.0
  • Support read-only collections of primitive types #31722
    9.0.0
  • Use EF8-style primitive collections in the Cosmos provider #25364
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: allow value converters for collections of primitive types #25343
    9.0.0
  • DbContext from pool contains many InternalEntityEntry instances after clearing change tracker #33354
  • SQL Server UseIdentityColumn() (and others) are incompatible with value generation #33413
    9.0.0-preview4

PullRequests

Merged

  • Consolidate primitive collections across relational and Cosmos #33456
    providers-beware, breaking-change
  • Fix funcletizer for VisitListInit #33466
  • Stop eagerly throwing when setting value generation strategy #33457
  • [release/6.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33303
    tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33304
    tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33305
    tell-mode

Updated

  • API review changes #33412
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
